Package middleware.base

Class Fraction

java.lang.Object
middleware.base.Fraction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Fraction>, INumberDatatype<Fraction>
public class Fraction extends Object implements INumberDatatype<Fraction>, Comparable<Fraction>
This class Fraction represent a fraction number datatype to provide more precision than a simple BigDecimal.
Since:
1.0 (2022/07/27)
Version:
1.0
Author:
janlucakoerner
See Also:
  • INumberDatatype
  • BigDecimal
  • Comparable

  • Constructor Details

    • Fraction

      public Fraction(BigDecimal numerator, BigDecimal denominator)
      Constructor for creating a new fraction by a separated numerator and denominator value.
      Parameters:
      numerator - The numerator of the fraction.
      denominator - The denominator of the fraction.

    • Fraction

      public Fraction(BigDecimal value)
      Constructor for creating a new fraction by a separated numerator. The denominator will always be set to one.
      Parameters:
      value - The numerator of the fraction.

    • Fraction

      public Fraction(String value)
      Constructor for creating a new fraction by a numerator and denominator which is divided by a slash.
      Parameters:
      value - The fraction in following format (1/2).

      public int compareTo(Fraction o)

      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Fraction>
      Parameters:
      o - The other fraction.
      Returns:
      -1 if first fraction is lower, 0 if both fractions are equal, 1 if first fraction is higher.
